nodes.text: This B1 battle droid was stationed on the planet Raxus Secundus, guarding an unnamed spaceport around 21 BBY during the events of the Clone Wars.

This Battle droid showed interest in checking two passengers of a Gozanti Cruiser which were actually padawan Ahsoka Tano and Senator Padmé Amidala in disguise, but his attention was distracted when a young handmaiden asked where platform B was.
This battle droid was voiced by Matthew Wood, the actor who voices all the battle droids in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series.
